WorkItem.ClosedComment: This should have been fixed with changeset 36425http://snippeteditor.codeplex.com/SourceControl/changeset/changes/36425And yes, I too store my favourite snippets in my documents path. You should be able to browse to that path fro mthe snippet editor to add.
WorkItem.Description:
I always store my snippets in my Documents folder (Documents/Visual Studio 2008 (or 2010)/Snippets) as it makes it easier to port my custom snippets between machines.
 
It'd be useful if I could also get those snippets loaded into the Snippet Editor.
 
It would also get around the problem of having to run the Snippet Editor as an administrator in Win Vista/ Win7 due to UAC locking down the Program Files folder.
WorkItem.Summary: Snippets from users Documents folder don't show up
